timeline.bodyText: What did you had to change relative to the standard implementation?
timeline.author: tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText:
getParser was already written to only work for search so I simply overwrote this method to use a bibtex parser.
I did have another look at the code, removed this part and added the required logic to getParser.
replies.author: joethei

timeline.message: changing code to not override performSearchById

timeline.author: DominikVoigt

replies.bodyText: as both SearchBased and IdBased Fetchers have a doPostCleanup default impl, the compiler is not sure which one to call
replies.author: joethei
